text: Kraven the Hunter is a 2024 American superhero movie based on the Marvel Comics villain of the same name. ==Overview== Directed by J. C. Chandor and written by Richard Wenk, Art Marcum, and Matt Holloway, the movie will be the 6th movie in Sony's Spider-Man Universe (SSU), a cinematic universe based on characters related to the superhero Spider-Man. Aaron Taylor-Johnson stars as Kraven, having played Quicksilver in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movie Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015). Rhino and the Chameleon, who are both Spider- Man's enemies like Kraven, also appear in the movie. Before Sony decided to make a Kraven movie, they planned to make him the main villain in one of Spider-Man's movies. The movie's budget is $130 million. ===Release=== The movie was released on December 13, 2024. ==Related pages== * Villian * Kraven == References == == Other websites == * * Category:2020s superhero movies Category:2024 action movies Category:American superhero movies Category:American action movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Sony's Spider-Man Universe movies
title: Kraven the Hunter (movie)
